column5: This cute 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit has a king and a queen size bed and is located on the second floor. The beach is within walking distance and the unit is beautifully updated with all new appliances. This unit will provide all of the extras you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.
column8: SEAHORSE CONDOS, #205 2 BDRM, 2 BTH, WALK TO BEACH
